events.name: Hack4Europe! 2012 - Copenhagen
events.about:
Hack4Europe! is a series of hack days organised by the Europeana Foundation and its partners and provide an exciting environment to explore the potential of open cultural data for social and economic growth in Europe.

Hack4Europe 2012 Copenhagen is being coordinated in cooperation with Poznań Supercomputing and Networking Center and IT University of Copenhagen. The event will take place on 10 and 11 May 2012 at IT University in Copenhagen.

The hackathon will bring together up to 30 developers from Denmark and the surrounding area. They will have access to the diverse and rich Europeana collections containing over 20 million records through the Europeana Search API (incl. a test key and technical documentation).

Participants will be encouraged to try out their ideas for creative reuse of the Europeana content and build prototypes showcasing the social and business value of open cultural data. Best prototypes will be awarded prizes (more info coming soon).

Developers must register in advance to indicate their interest. Please register by the end of April 2012. Depending on the demand for the event, organisers will decide on the final delegate list and send a confirmation letter to the selected ones.

Follow us on Twitter: #hack4europe

events.name: Windows 8 hackathon
events.about:
Will you be there from the start to develop Windows 8 apps?

Windows Developers in Denmark is hosting its first Windows 8 hackathon Saturday 31 in March. Here you have the opportunity to come and develop Windows 8 apps that other developers. We make sure that there are some talented Windows 8 developers present who can help with questions, problems and create something inspired.

Lunch and other fortærring is for their own account (the coffee is free!).

Seats are very limited.

Questions and or comments can be directed to windowsdev@live.com.
